verse: The Lord said to Moses,

“Give this command to the ·people [sons/children] of Israel: ‘You will soon enter Canaan and ·it will be yours. These shall be the borders […this is the land that will fall to you as an inheritance, the land of Canaan according to its borders/boundaries]:
On the south you will get part of the ·Desert [Wilderness] of Zin near the border of Edom. On the east side your southern border will start at the south end of the ·Dead [Salt] Sea,
cross south of ·Scorpion Pass [or the Ascent of Akrabbim], and go through the ·Desert [Wilderness] of Zin and south of Kadesh Barnea. Then it will go to Hazar Addar and over to Azmon.
From Azmon it will go to the ·brook [wadi] of Egypt, and it will end at the ·Mediterranean Sea [Sea].
“‘Your western border will be the ·Mediterranean [Great] Sea.
“‘Your northern border will begin at the ·Mediterranean [Great] Sea and ·go [mark/draw a line] to Mount Hor.
From Mount Hor ·it will go [mark/draw a line] to Lebo Hamath, and on to Zedad.
Then the border will go to Ziphron, and it will end at Hazar Enan. This will be your northern border.
“‘Your eastern border will begin at Hazar Enan and ·go [mark/draw a line] to Shepham.
From Shepham the border will go ·east of [down to] Ain to Riblah and ·along [go down to] the hills east of ·Lake [the Sea of] ·Galilee [Kinnereth].
Then the border will go down along the Jordan River and end at the ·Dead [Salt] Sea.

So Moses gave this command to the Israelites: “This is the land you will ·receive [inherit]. Throw lots [perhaps the Urim and Thummim; Ex. 28:30; Lev. 8:8] to divide it among the nine and one-half tribes, because the Lord commanded that it should be theirs.

The tribes of ·Reuben [the sons/descendants of Reuben] by their families [clans], ·Gad [the sons/descendants of Gad] by their families [clans], and ·East [the half-tribe of] Manasseh have already ·received [inherited] their land.
These two and one-half tribes received ·land [their inheritance] east of the Jordan River, across from Jericho [32:1–42].”
Then the Lord said to Moses,
“These are the names of the men who will ·divide [apportion] the land for inheritance: Eleazar the priest and Joshua son of Nun.
Also take one leader from each tribe to help ·divide [apportion] the land for inheritance.
These are the names of the leaders: from the tribe of Judah, Caleb son of Jephunneh;
from the tribe of ·Simeon [the sons/descendants of Simeon], Shemuel son of Ammihud;
from the tribe of Benjamin, Elidad son of Kislon;
from the tribe of ·Dan [the sons/descendants of Dan], Bukki son of Jogli;
from the tribe of ·Manasseh [the sons/descendants of Manasseh] son of Joseph, Hanniel son of Ephod;
from the tribe of ·Ephraim [the sons/descendants of Ephraim] son of Joseph, Kemuel son of Shiphtan;
from the tribe of ·Zebulun [the sons/descendants of Zebulun], Elizaphan son of Parnach;
from the tribe of ·Issachar [the sons/descendants of Issachar], Paltiel son of Azzan;
from the tribe of ·Asher [the sons/descendants of Asher], Ahihud son of Shelomi;
from the tribe of ·Naphtali [the sons/descendants of Naphtali], Pedahel son of Ammihud.”
The Lord commanded these men to ·divide [apportion] for inheritance the land of Canaan among the ·Israelites [sons/children of Israel].
